Alert Name: bush
Wolfowitz resignation talks reported
White House officials say World Bank chief would step down, while bank would take some blame in handling of girlfriend's transfer to State Department.
05/16/07 03:51 PM, EDT
Embattled World Bank President Paul Wolfowitz and the White House were in talks Wednesday afternoon with World Bank officials to work out details of his resignation, senior administration officials told CNN.
